member.summary: All public data about a QMod.

member.summary:
The ID of the mod
Can only contain alphanumeric characters and underscores: (, , , )

member.summary: The display name of the mod

member.summary: The author of the mod

member.summary: The game this mod was developed for.

member.name: P:QModManager.API.ModLoading.IQMod.RequiredMods
member.summary: The dependencies of the mod and their optional minimum required version

member.name: P:QModManager.API.ModLoading.IQMod.ModsToLoadBefore
member.summary: A list of mods, before which, this mod will load

member.name: P:QModManager.API.ModLoading.IQMod.ModsToLoadAfter
member.summary: A list of mods, after which, this mod will load

member.name: P:QModManager.API.ModLoading.IQMod.LoadedAssembly
member.summary:
The assembly of this mod
Check if before using

member.name: P:QModManager.API.ModLoading.IQMod.AssemblyName
member.summary: The assembly name of the mod

member.name: P:QModManager.API.ModLoading.IQMod.ParsedVersion
member.summary: The version of the mod.

member.name: P:QModManager.API.ModLoading.IQMod.Enable
member.summary: Whether or not this mod is enabled

member.name: P:QModManager.API.ModLoading.IQMod.IsLoaded
member.summary: Whether or not this mod has been loaded

member.name: T:QModManager.API.ModLoading.PatchResults
member.summary: An optional value that can be returned from a mod patching method.

member.name: F:QModManager.API.ModLoading.PatchResults.OK
member.summary:
The patch method ran successfully.
A method that returns and does not through an exception will default to this value.

member.name: F:QModManager.API.ModLoading.PatchResults.Error
member.summary:
The patch method encountered an error.
Execution of any further patch methods this mod implements will be skipped.

member.name: F:QModManager.API.ModLoading.PatchResults.ModderCanceled
member.summary:
Informs that the mod author has requested that patching be halted for this mod.
Execution of any further patch methods this mod implements will be skipped.
This doesn't necessarily imply that and error happened, so it will be handled silently.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Identifies another QMod, by Id, that this mod requires to function.

member.summary: Identifies what minimum version the other mod should be at.

member.summary: Identifies another QMod that must be loaded before this mod.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The other mod that must be loaded before this mod can be.

member.name: P:QModManager.API.ModLoading.QModLoadAfter.OtherMod
member.summary: Identifies another QMod, by Id. If this other mod is present, your mod will be loaded after it.

member.name: T:QModManager.API.ModLoading.QModLoadBefore
member.summary: Identifies another QMod that cannot be loaded before this mod.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The other mod that must wait to load until after this mod does.

member.name: P:QModManager.API.ModLoading.QModLoadBefore.OtherMod
member.summary: Identifies another QMod, by Id. If this other mod is present, your mod will be loaded before it.
